mapper.select: select * from HYDMYIJI
select * from HYDMERJI where HYYIJIDM = #{HYYIJIDM}

SELECT XYXXB.*,case XYXXB.XB when '1' then '男' else '女' end as XBG,HYDMYIJI.HYYIJIDMMC||'-'||HYDMERJI.HYERJIDMMC as cshy FROM XYXXB inner JOIN HYDMYIJI on XYXXB.HYYIJIDM=HYDMYIJI.HYYIJIDM inner join HYDMERJI on XYXXB.HYERJIDM=HYDMERJI.HYERJIDM where XXDM = #{XXDM} and XYDM = #{XYDM} and ZYIDLSH = #{ZYIDLSH}
mapper.insert: insert into XYXXB(ID,XM,XB,HYYIJIDM,HYERJIDM,XGZDW,RXNF,XYDM,XXDM,ZYIDLSH) values (#{ID},#{XM},#{XB},#{HYYIJIDM},#{HYERJIDM},#{XGZDW},#{RXNF},#{XYDM},#{XXDM},#{ZYIDLSH})
mapper.delete: delete from XYXXB where ID = #{ID}
mapper.update: update XYXXB set XM = #{XM}, XB = #{XB}, HYYIJIDM = #{HYYIJIDM}, HYERJIDM = #{HYERJIDM}, XGZDW = #{XGZDW}, RXNF = #{RXNF} WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select count(*) from BKTBCXCY where BKTBCXCY.XXDM = #{XXDM}
select count(*) from ZKTBCXCY where ZKTBCXCY.XXDM = #{XXDM}
